casebody.data:
BERGEN RIDGE HOMEOWNERS ASSOCIATION, INC., Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
TOWNSHIP OF NORTH BERGEN PLANNING BOARD, Riverview Development, LLC and Township of North Bergen, Defendants-Respondents. C-547 September Term 2018
081878 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 25, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000206-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
